title: Walking into Dreams
description: Emily Noland wants to help people like herself. Sheâ€™d be perfectly happy teaching them how to ski, but fate has other plans for Emily. Her curious nature leads her into an experience which causes her mind to begin dreaming in a new way. Seeking the truth behind her new ability, Emily literally travels around the world, on an adventure born in her dreams. Her life blossoms with love and happiness, then everything changes. From the bestselling author of Time Chain and Child of Another Kind comes a novel that explores the power of the human mind to pierce the veil of the future, for better or for worse.
author: Steven Decker
